manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_xfzc_fans` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `themeid` int(11) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `nickname` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `headimg` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `tel` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `state` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `addtime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_xfzc_goods` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `themeid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `gname` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `gprice` float DEFAULT NULL, `djdz` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `djdh` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `jpurl` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `jpimg` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_xfzc_helper` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `themeid` int(11) NOT NULL, `memberid` int(11) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `helpid` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `zcje` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, `zfy` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `tid` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `addtime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_xfzc_member` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `themeid` int(11) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `nickname` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `headlogo` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `name1` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `name2` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `zcgy` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `zcsum` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, `tel` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `zctime` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `state` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `scannum` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_xfzc_order` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `themeid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `memberid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `orderno` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `goodsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `openid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `mopenid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `fee` float DEFAULT NULL, `comments` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `state` int(2) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_xfzc_rule` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `themeid` int(11) NOT NULL, `img1` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `img2` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `img3` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `img4` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `img5` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `img6` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `content` varchar(5000) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_xfzc_setting` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `toppic1` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `toppic2` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `admindo` int(2) NOT NULL, `fansfb` int(2) NOT NULL, `fanszf` int(2) NOT NULL, `fanszczj` int(2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_xfzc_system` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `themeid` int(11) NOT NULL, `leftimg` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `rightimg` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `img1` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `name1` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `name2` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `img2` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `img3` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `img4` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `img5` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `img6` varchar(300) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_water_xfzc_theme` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `tname` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `keyword` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `kftel` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `hlogo` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `zcxcy` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `flogo` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `jszc` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `jszcurl` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `tdays` int(11) NOT NULL, `zcjefw` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `jetype` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `xieyi` varchar(5000) NOT NULL, `sharedesc` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `sharetitle` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `fansdo` int(2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
